channel.title: Dual Cell Devices – Cloud Chemistry
channel.description: Premium eLiquid Custom Handmade to Order™

item.title: VOOPOO Alpha 1 (α-I) MOD
item.dc:creator: Matteo Laki
item.description: Super Retro design will make you feel like you stepped back in time!
item.content:encoded:
Description:
VOOPOO Alpha 1 (α-I) 222W TC Box Mod is powered by the super US Gene Fun chip and dual batteries. Accurately pulsed power output max 222w under LOVE mode. Cool, clean, all-metal box fast and fastest fire speed – 0.023s. You can always keep the mod up-to-date with upgradeable firmware too so you will never miss anything new. The attractive appearance is another feature that makes this mod simply irresistible. Powered by 2x 18650 High Amp batteries (sold separately) to easily be hidden inside of its retro design will make you feel like you are back in the 80’s or early 90’s!

Specifications:

  • Material: Zinc Alloy
  • Wattage: 5-222W
  • Size: 89.5*54*25mm
  • Battey: 2*18650(Support balance charging whatever brand batteries)
  • Output Voltage Range: 0-7.5V
  • Lowest Resistance in power mode: 0.05ohm
  • Lowest Resistance in TC mode: 0.05ohm
  • New function: Love Mode
  • TC Mode: SS,NI,TI,NC
  • Color Options: Black/ Gray / Pearl Chrome

Package Includes:
1 x VOOPOO Alpha One 222W Mod
1 x USB Cable
1 x User Manual
1 x Warranty card

item.title: JoyeTech Batpack Complete Kit
item.dc:creator: Matteo Laki
item.description: The Batpack is the first vaporizer that is capable of using normal, disposable AA batteries as an option for a source of power!
item.content:encoded:
The Joyetech BatPack Starter Kit with batteries is completely authentic in power, brand and performance! The Joyetech BatPack comes equipped with the Joyetech Eco D16 Tank, two batteries and it delivers exclusivity in every sense of the word!

The distinctness behind the Batpack is that it is a very small vaporizer that literally fits in the palm of your hand…comfortably! (Imagine that?) This completely portable device makes vaping convenient and hassle-free every single time. The Batpack is recognized as the first vaporizer that is capable of using normal, disposable AA batteries as an option for a source of power. When you use fully charged rechargeable batteries (2000mAh), it gets you more puffs than the normal AA batteries while you’re vaping…(try 800 puffs)!

The Batpack also uses ECO technology to provide incredible vaping experiences while allowing the battery to have a very low output. The ECO technology doubles the battery life and extends the amount of time you vape before having to recharge the batteries. This is in part because of the Joyetech ECO D16 Tank which has a 2ml capacity and an anti-leak structure, so leaks become non-existent. Filling e-juice can be done directly and conveniently. Dripping a few drops of e-Lliquid to the atomizer head, avoids dry burns while you’re vaping. Not to be outdone, the ECO D16 works with the included BFHN 0.5ohm MTL coil head.

Kit Features:

  • Size:112.5 x 37.00 x 18.0mm (Including Tank)
  • Weight: 88.0g
  • Simple One Button Design
  • 1.85V Constant Output
  • E-Liquid Capacity: 2.0mL
  • Top Fill Design with Twist Off Cap
  • Dual Restrictive Airflow Hole Design
  • Lightweight and Compact Design
  • Optimized for Higher Nicotine Levels

Package Contents:

  • 1x Batpack Mod
  • 1x Joyetech ECO D16 Tank
  • 2x AA batteries
  • 2x BFHN 0.5ohm Head (MTL)
  • 1x Set of Spare Parts
  • 1x Micro USB Cable

item.title: SmokTech I-Priv KIT
item.dc:creator: Matteo Laki
item.description: Comes with AI, in 3 different voices! It can clearly hear you, respond you and execute your commands!
item.content:encoded:
When a mod comes with AI, what will happen? The new product I-Priv will show you! It can clearly hear you, respond you and execute your commands. The mod shaped like a warrior, full of muscles, combining with 1-230W output power, it can guarantee powerful vaping effects. From its round TFT screen you can see a newly designed dynamic user interface. And the ergonomically designed lateral fire key is extremely convenient to operate. There’s also a LED light at the bottom, you can set to see flickering light. It’s equipped with TFV12 Prince tank, which has revolutionary strip coil and 8ml capacity. Besides, this mod is compatible with 21700, 20700 and 18650 battery. Advanced technology, multiple functions, your warrior is coming! Innovation keeps changing the vaping experience!

I-Priv MOD Specifications:

  • Size: 95.5 x 56 x 35mm
  • Weight: 188.6g
  • Power Range: 1-230W
  • Output Voltage: 0.5-8.2V
  • Resistance Range: 0.1-2.5 Ohm (VW) / 0.05-2 Ohm (TC)
  • Temperature Range: 200-600 F / 100-315 C

TFV12 Prince Tank Specifications:

  • Capacity: 8mL
  • Dimensions: 28 x 63mm
  • Weight: 60g
  • Material: Stainless Steel
  • Thread: 510

THE SYMBOL OF A WARRIOR – STRONG BODY – I-Priv mod has a strong body, which is fully covered with exoskeleton, giving the whole kit an unbreakable and charming look. Hold it on your hand, you can feel the super power from this warrior.

ARC REACTOR SCREEN – I-Priv has a round TFT screen at front, like the warrior arc reactor, providing inexhaustible power to the whole kit. Also, you can clearly see the vaping details through the screen.

YOU COMMAND YOUR WARRIOR RESPOND – I-Priv is designed with AI technology, it can accurately receive, respond, and execute your command. Below here are 14 command codes, the secret codes between you and your warrior.

*NOTE* One important thing, you must turn on the voice and choose the voice type first.

item.title: iJoy Mystique Mesh KIT
item.dc:creator: Matteo Laki
item.description: Mystique Mod adopts 5 optional modes of: PMODE, POWER, POD, MTL and TEMP!
item.content:encoded:
What surprise can be produced when aesthetics meets innovation? The iJoy Mystique Mesh Kit will give you the answer, consisting of the Mystique Mod and Mystique Mesh Tank. The Mystique Mod adopts 5 optional modes of PMODE, POWER, POD, MTL and TEMP. It is compatible with dual 18650 batteries (not included) and can fire at wattage up to 162W with beastly power but a full safety suite of protection. The artwork by iJoy with the stylish streamlined design meet visionary creativity and palm-friendly size to seamlessly provide a harmonious touch and feel.

The Mystique Mesh Tank features a generous 3mL e-juice capacity with an easy top refill system without any leakage and adopts the food-grade plastic to bring you safe vaping experiences and the 0.15 ohm mesh coil resistance is optimized for best flavor with cloud production.

Specifications:

  • Max Wattage: 162W
  • Size: 130mm x 54mm x 27mm
  • Bright and big size screen
  • No overhang with 26mm tanks
  • Dual 18650 batteries Box Mod
  • Personalized design, with a unique experience
  • NI/TI/SS temperature control
  • TCR function
  • Unique Custom User Mode
  • Resistance Range: 0.05~3.0 ohm
  • Firmware Upgradeable

DUAL 18650 BATTERIES – Compatible with the tantamount power of dual 18650 batteries, the battery life of Mystique Mesh Kit lasts TWICE as long as competitive devices.

ERGONOMIC SIDE FIRE BUTTON – The ergonomic fire button is on the side, which is made of substantial stainless steel and emits strong fortitude.

FIVE OPTIONAL MODES – The innovation-oriented Mystique Mesh Kit adopts PMODE/POWER/POD/MTL and TEMP Mods for your selection, meeting your different vaping needs with outstanding performance, long-lasting battery, and all around protection.

Kit Includes:

  • 1 x Mystique Mod
  • 1 x Mystique Mesh Tank
  • 1 x USB Cable
  • 1 x User Manual
  • 1 x Warranty Card

item.title: Vaporesso Polar 220W KIT
item.dc:creator: Matteo Laki
item.description: The Polar is capable of 5-220W output range, resistance range of 0.03-5ohm, and various firing modes
item.content:encoded:
The Vaporesso Polar 220W Starter Kit is a modern mod that features the upgraded Omni Board 4.0 chipset, a vibrant 2.0″ OLED display, and strikingly futuristic design to pair with the new Cascade Baby SE Tank. The Polar is capable of 5-220W output range, resistance range of 0.03-5ohm, and various firing modes. Capable of different user modes, temperature control abilities, and functions, the Polar’s Omni Board 4.0 chip allows for Super Player Mode, a broad resistance range that is meant for most of the industry’s tanks. In addition, an “Insta-fire” mode cuts the activation speed to 0.001s, meaning rapid flavor and taste, from the first breath to the last. The Polar 220W Starter Kit is powered by a pair of 18650 batteries, which can be accessed via a magnetic door. Important data is displayed on the 2.0″ TFT color screen, relaying info such as temperature or wattage, battery life, and voltage. Optimized with a 2.5A max charge capability , the Vaporesso Polar is sure to spend more time in use than charging. The kit is paired with the Cascade Baby SE Tank, featuring 6mL maximum juice capacity, triple slotted airflow control, and the utilization of the GT Coil System.

Vaporesso Polar 220W Starter Kit Features:

  • Dimensions – 144mm by 45mm by 28mm (Includes Tank)
  • Dual 18650 High Amp Battery – Not Included
  • Wattage Output Range: 5-220W
  • Resistance Range: 0.03-5.0 Ohm
  • Other Modes: Smart VW(H/N/S) / VT(SS, NI, TI) / CCT / CCW / VV / CCV
  • BYPASS Mode
  • TCR Adjustment – 2 Memory Modes
  • Super Player Mode – Broad Tank Resistance ID
  • OMNI Board 4.0 Chipset – 0.001s Insta-Fire
  • 2.0″ TFT Full Color Display
  • Side Fire Button Operation
  • LED Light Indicator
  • Bottom-Loaded Magnetized Battery Cover
  • Short Circuit Protection
  • Burn Protection
  • No Load Protection
  • Overtime Protection
  • Low Resistance Protection
  • Low Power Protection
  • Overcharge Protection
  • ESD Circuit Protection
  • Pass Through Protection
  • MicroUSB Port – 2.5A Max Charge
  • Centered 510 Stainless Steel Connection
  • Available in Silver, Black, Red, Blue, Green, Gold, Metallic Grey

Vaporesso Cascade Baby SE Sub-Ohm Tank:

  • 24.5mm Diameter
  • 6.5mL Max Juice Capacity
  • Superior Stainlesss Steel Construction
  • Pyrex Glass Reinforcement
  • Isolation Structure Design – Separates Juice & Coil Chamber
  • Vaporesso GT Coil System
  • 0.15ohm GT 8 Coil – rated for 50-110W
  • 0.18ohm GT Mesh Coil – ratef for 50-90W
  • Triple Triangular-Shaped Airflow Control
  • Delrin Widebore Drip Tip
  • Slide-n-Fill Design – Convenient Top-Fill
  • 510 Connection

Includes:

  • 1 Polar 220W Box Mod
  • 1 Cascade Baby SE Sub-Ohm Tank
  • 1 0.15ohm GT8 Coil
  • 1 0.18 GT Mesh Coil
  • 1 Replacement Glass Tube
  • 1 USB Charging Cable
  • 1 User Guide
  • 1 Warranty Card

item.title: Smok T-Storm MOD
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: The T-Storm can fire up to 230 watts and supports multiple temperature control modes!
item.content:encoded:
The SMOK T-Storm Vape Mod features a futuristic inspired vape mod with a durable metallic zinc alloy construction. The T-Storm can fire up to 230 watts and supports multiple temperature control modes. The T-Storm features multiple preheat modes and a memory mode as well. The T-Storm features a large TFT display screen with a detailed operating interface that is easy to view and understand. The T-Storm is powered by (2) high amp 18650 batteries (sold separately) and may be charged via the front micro USB charging port in an emergency (but not recommended). *We recommend an external charger for optimal charging*

 

Features and Specs:

  • Dimensions: 3-5/16″ x 1-3/4″ x 1-1/16″
  • Spring Loaded 510 Contact Pin
  • Output Wattage: 1.0 – 230.0W
  • Temperature Control: Nickel 200 (Ni200), Titanium (Ti), Stainless Steel 316 (SS), TCR
  • Temperature Control Range: 200 – 600F / 100 – 315C
  • Resistance Range: 0.1 – 2.5ohm for Wattage Mode
  • Resistance Range: 0.05 – 2.0ohm for Temperature Control Mode
  • Preheat Modes – NORM/SOFT/HARD
  • Memory Mode
  • Large Side Fire Button
  • Futuristic Metallic Design
  • TFT Display Screen
  • Zinc Alloy Construction
  • Requires (2) High Amp 18650 Batteries (Sold Separately)
  • *We recommend an external charger for optimal charging*
  • Front Micro USB Charging Port

item.title: Smok A-Priv MOD
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Features unique sound / music activated LED lights
item.content:encoded:
The A-Priv Mod from Smok features unique sound / music activated LED lights that are designed to dazzle and wow. The A-Priv features a comfortable hollowed out ergonomic design with LED lights peeking through. It can fire up to 225 watts and supports multiple temperature control modes. It also features multiple preheat modes and a stealth mode as well. There is an OLED display screen located on the top of the device for your convenience. The A-Priv is powered by (2) high amp 18650 batteries (sold separately) and may be charged via the side micro USB charging port.

Innovation keeps changing the vaping experience!

Specifications:

  • Wattage: 1-225W
    • Variable Wattage Modes
      • Soft
      • Normal
      • Hard
    • Full Temperature Control Suite
      • 200 to 600 Degrees Fahrenheit
      • 100 to 315 Degrees Celsius
    • VW Mode: 0.10 to 2.5 ohm Atomizer Resistance
    • TC Mode: 0.05 to 2.0 ohm Atomizer Resistance
    • Memory Mode
    • TC Mode
      • Nickel, Titanium, and Stainless Steel Wire Compatible
    • Integrated Protections
      • 10 Second Cutoff, Overheat Protection, Low Resistance Protection and Low Voltage Protection
  • Zinc Alloy Construction
    • Three Button Interface
      • One Firing Button
      • Two Option Buttons
    • Dual 18650 Battery Integration
      • Sold Separately
    • 50.43mm by 32mm by 87.5mm
  • OLED Display
    • Wattage Output
    • Dual Battery Life
    • Ohm Reading
    • Current Voltage
    • Mode Selection
  • LED Light Indication
    • Music Activation
    • Multi-Color
    • Wrap Around Light Design
  • Spring Loaded 510
    • Gold Plated Contact
    • Stainless Steel Threads
    • 25mm Diameter

Box Contents:

  • 1 x A-Priv Mod
  • 1 x Micro USB Cable
  • 1  User Manual
  • Spare Parts

item.title: Uwell Ironfist Kit
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Provides multiple types of protection to safeguard against potential risk.
item.content:encoded:
IRONFIST Kit DESCRIPTION:

  • Tank Capacity: 5 ml
  • Atomizer Size: diameter 24.5mm x height 62.7mm
  • Mod Size: 56.5*28.4*86.5 mm
  • Material: zinc alloy, leather, stainless steel, quartz glass
  • Power range: 5-200W
  • Exclusive single switch design, no need to click the fire button 5 times.
  • Multiple modes: Power mode, TC mode (NI, SS, TI) and bypass mode.
  • Powered by: dual 18650 batteries.
  • Ergonomic design and wrapped in leather, makes it feel more comfortable in the hand.
  • Provides multiple types of protection to safeguard against potential risk.

IRONFIST Kit Includes:

  • 1×IRONFIST mod
  • 1×CROWN Ⅲ Tank
  • 1×Extra quartz glass
  • 1×0.25Ω coil ( installed)
  • 1×0.4Ω coil
  • 1×pack of replacement O-rings
  • 1×Micro USB cable
  • 1×User’s manual
  • 1×Crown key
  • 1×Drip tip cover (to cover the drip tip when it is not used)

item.title: iJoy Avenger PD270 Complete Kit
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Voice control to bring you the first "AI" Vape Mod!
item.content:encoded:
iJoy is changing the concept of what the future of vaping looks like with the new Avenger 270. The Avenger Mod uses the latest technological advancement, voice control to bring you the first “AI” Vape Mod!

The Avenger 270 is a unique “one-of-a-kind” vape platform designed to free the hands by employing voice control functions that include: wattage up/down, lock device, light color, music color, and so on.

Paired with the Avenger 270 Mod is the new iJoy Avenger Sub-Ohm Tank, a high performance cloud chasing tank featuring the iJoy X3 family coil heads and the new innovative pre-made MESH coils.

Product Features:

  • Voice control
  • Max Wattage: 234W
  • Compact and portable
  • Bright and big size screen
  • No overhang with 30mm tanks
  • Dual 20700 batteries Box Mod (batteries included)
  • 18650 battery fit with adapter
  • Personalized design, with a unique experience
  • NI/TI/SS temperature control
  • TCR function
  • Unique Custom User Mode
  • Resistance Range: 0.05~3.0 ohm
  • USB port charging support
  • Firmware Upgradeable

Product Includes:

  • 1 x iJoy Avenger PD270 Box Mod
  • 2 x 20700 Batteries
  • 1 x 18650 Adapter
  • 1 x Avenger Sub-Ohm
  • 1 x X3-MESH Coil (mesh coil, wood pulp + cotton, 0.15 ohm, 40-90W pre-installed)
  • 1 x X3-C1S Coil (wood pulp + cotton, 0.35 ohm, 40-80W)
  • 1 x Replacement Glass
  • 1 x Tool Pack
  • 1 x USB Cable
  • 1 x Manual
  • 1 x Warranty Card

item.title: Vaptio Capt’n Kit
item.dc:creator: James
item.content:encoded:
*SMOK BABY BEAST COIL COMPATIBLE*

The Capt’n takes the Vaptio Heroes series to new heights with its premium design and epic taste production. The 220 watt Capt’n Mod has a zinc-alloy frame and IML panel body. This allows for both a sturdy and light-weight design.  The Capt’n tank improves the Frogman coil technology by adding a larger area for airflow and larger 4mL tank capacity. Coming in seven different colors, and universal coil base compatibility, we ensure you’ll be able to pick out the Capt’n kit that best suits your vaping preferences.

Kit Specifications:

  • 122mm x 33mm x 42mm
  • Screen Size: 1.3 inch Color TFT
  • Output Power: 10-220W
  • Output Mode: VW/TC/Smart/CCW/CCT/Bypass
  • Tank Capacity: 4.0mL
  • Resistance Range: 0.1-5.0 ohms
  • Frogman W2-Coil: 0.4 Ohm Kanthal DL
  • Frogman W8-Coil: 0.15 Ohms Kanthal DL
  • Battery Capacity: 2 x 18650 (external, not included)

UNLOCK YOUR CAPT’N INNER BEAST WITH SUPERCHARGER TECH – Fire it up to the maximum throttle in only 0.005 seconds. Go as low as 0.1 ohm resistance in bypass mode. Take your Capt’n to the limit!

IML TECHNOLOGY – VIVID COLORS, ENDLESS DESIGN OPTIONS – In-Mould Labeling a.k.a. IML technology allows for the most intricate designs to be labeled under a thin sheet of plastic giving it the appearance that it is printed, yet ultra-shiny, like a smartphone finish. The design never wears off and the colors stay forever vibrant.

DEFINING THE NEW 220W POCKET-SIZE MOD – Everyone knows the idiom ‘good things come in small packages.’ Vaptio’s Capt’n takes this to a totally different level. Compact mod, pocket mod – powerful doesn’t always have to be big! Capt’n – redefining versatile on-the-go 220w vaping portability.

6 INTELLIGENT OUTPUT MODES – Enjoy customizable and smart modes to enhance your high watt vaping experience.

  • Smart Mode, VW Mode, TC Mode, CCW Mode, CCT Mode, Bypass Mode

1.3 INCH TFT COLOR SCREEN – Vaptio’s Capt’n is not only our most compact mod, it also incorporates a 1.3 inch color screen, making it one of the most compact, easy-to-navigate mods on the market.

PATENTED ANTI-LEAK TECHNOLOGY – Newly patented anti-leak design protects your mod circuitry from the rare occasional times your tank may leak.

Kit Includes:

  • 1 x Capt’n Mod
  • 1 x Capt’n 4mL Tank (*SMOK BABY BEAST COIL COMPATIBLE*)
  • 1 x Frogman-W2 Coil
  • 1 x Frogman-W8 Coil
  • 2 x User Manual
  • Spare Parts
